channel.title: Project InFecTion. Let The HaXx Begin. *Updated: 03/05/2011*
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/1628/splashwi.png[/img][/center] [center]Hello and welcome, I come here today to start up a project. As many people say all PI servers are alike, which may be true in some cases, however, I can assure you that Project InFecTion is a server like no other. There are currently two people in this project whom are Emile and myself. So please read all our features and join if you are willing.. [/center] [center][img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/8639/informationf.jpg[/img][/center]
-Hand Cannon working perfectly. -All spirit shields working perfectly with correct effects. -Torva armour working perfectly with correct effects. -All specials including Vls, Swh, Claws, Dbow, etc.. are 100% -Combat is amazing. -Soulsplit actually working. -Turmoil working perfectly. -Many skills including summoning. -New Rs trade interface. -New splash screen. -All basic minigames, Jad, Fight Pits, Duel arena, etc.. -Switching is perfect.
Will Be added:
-Bounty Hunter (fully working.) -New Rs Hitmarkers. -Moving Splash screen. -Custom Jframe. -Zombie minigame.
Server Log:
___________________________ Date: April 26th Time: 17:05 Notes: Client wasen't working because the jframe files were missing.... FIXED ___________________________ Date: April 27th Time: 22:55 Notes: Added ::Vote command with recurring message - Added ::Stat + playername + command which displays users stats - Added ::Update + secs + to update server ___________________________ April 25 8:33 PM -Cleaned Out Commands/Got rid Of Useless stuff. Added Splash Screen. ______________________ April 25 8:37 PM -Made a beastly Yell System _____________________ April 25 8:40 PM -Made ::report (name) What this does is when a player wants to report somebody it would do a server yell that the player wants to report someone, which means a staff member would go to him. _______________________
My Computer has a virus from some stupid bot so I'm going to post some pictures of before updates, these pictures look like any other PI but once my computer is working properly il post more, Thanks. [left][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3238/mediazf.jpg[/img][/left] Vls: [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1619/vlsc.jpg[/img] SwH: [img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/1456/swhi.jpg[/img] SS: [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/407/74118751.jpg[/img] Blitz + Dds: [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/7097/ddsjs.jpg[/img] Dbow: [img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/7782/dbow.jpg[/img] Claws: [img]http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/8979/clawsj.jpg[/img] Prayers: [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/7141/turmoil.jpg[/img] [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/2303/purplething.jpg[/img] [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/3418/prayert.jpg[/img] Skillcape: [img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4930/skillcape.jpg[/img] Spots Taken/Available:
Source Coders- 2/2 (Me, Emile) Client Coders- 1/2 (Emile) Web Designer- 0/1 GFX Designer- 1/2 (Brian) Hoster- 0/1
If you would like to join this project please fill the information below corresponding to your position choice. Client Coder:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Experience: Position: Why do you want to join?
Website Designer:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Position: Experience/Some of your work:
GFX Deigner:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Position: Some of your work:
Hoster:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Servers hosted before? Currently own Vps Or Dedi?
Thank you for your time. We would love if u suggest anything u would like to see. :D Msn: fmcomar@hotmail.com [center][img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/3142/creditsjf.jpg[/img][/center] -Me -Emile -Sanity -Brian

item.title: Project InFecTion. Let The HaXx Begin. *Updated: 03/05/2011*
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Hello and welcome,

I come here today to start up a project. As many people say all PI servers are alike, which may be true in some cases, however, I can assure you that Project InFecTion is a server like no other. There are currently two people in this project whom are Emile and myself. So please read all our features and join if you are willing…
[/center]

[center][/center]

-Hand Cannon working perfectly. -All spirit shields working perfectly with correct effects. -Torva armour working perfectly with correct effects. -All specials including Vls, Swh, Claws, Dbow, etc.. are 100% -Combat is amazing. -Soulsplit actually working. -Turmoil working perfectly. -Many skills including summoning. -New Rs trade interface. -New splash screen. -All basic minigames, Jad, Fight Pits, Duel arena, etc.. -Switching is perfect.
Will Be added:
-Bounty Hunter (fully working.) -New Rs Hitmarkers. -Moving Splash screen. -Custom Jframe. -Zombie minigame.

Server Log:

___________________________ Date: April 26th Time: 17:05

Notes: Client wasen’t working because the jframe files were missing… FIXED

Date: April 27th
Time: 22:55

Notes: Added ::Vote command with recurring message
- Added ::Stat + playername + command which displays users stats
- Added ::Update + secs + to update server

April 25
8:33 PM

-Cleaned Out Commands/Got rid Of Useless stuff. Added Splash Screen.

April 25
8:37 PM

-Made a beastly Yell System

April 25
8:40 PM

-Made ::report (name) What this does is when a player wants to report somebody it would do a server yell that the player wants to report someone, which means a staff member would go to him.
_______________________

My Computer has a virus from some stupid bot so I’m going to post some pictures of before updates, these pictures look like any other PI but once my computer is working properly il post more, Thanks.

[left][/left]
